templates.name: Do you offer international shipping?
templates.content: For international orders, our processing time is 1-2 business days. Once shipped, it will take 10-16 business days.

templates.name: How wide are the straps of the Elements Tote?
templates.content: They're 38 mm wide.

templates.name: Difference between Bravo Sling and Go Sling
templates.content: Great question! The only difference is that the Pro version has slashproof fabric and a self-locking magnetic buckle.

templates.name: I made a purchase, how long does it take for points to show up?
templates.content: It takes 10 days after a purchase is made from points to move from pending to active.

templates.name: When do points expire?
templates.content: They expire 365 days from the day of the last qualifying purchase.

templates.name: My order has a pre-order item. When will it ship?
templates.content: If your order contains a pre-order item, every item in the order will be shipped together once the pre-order item is available.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: All U.S. orders are shipped from our Dallas warehouse.

templates.name: Do you offer free returns?
templates.content: All orders in the continental U.S. (except bundles) can be returned free of charge when returned to a Happy Returns Hub. When items are returned via post, there is a $9 shipping and restocking fee.

templates.name: What is the difference between VX42 vs X50?
templates.content: X50 is a 500d face fabric with Mylar backing. The VX42 is 420 denier fabric with 70d backing. The 500d is more abrasion resistant, but also picks up more cat and dog hair, whereas the 420d fabric is glossier and doesn't pick up dusts and hair that easily.

templates.name: Whatâ€™s the difference between X-PAC VX42 Black and Ballistic Nylon 840D Black materials?
templates.content: XPAC material is 420D and is made in the USA. The main benefit of it is lightness, waterproof protection and strength from its Kevlar X grid reinforcement. Our 840D is made in Taiwan from US-made nylon thread with a waterproof rubber backing.

templates.name: How to be an affiliate
templates.content: If you're looking to be an affiliate, you can sign up here: https://avantlinkdev2.wpengine.com/programs/19369/alpaka-affiliate-program/

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://alpakagear.com/pages/exclusive-discounts

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://returns.alpakagear.com/#/ For Bundle returns please go to the following link: https://alpakagear.returnscenter.com/

templates.name: Are there any differences between the Alpaka X Excessorize Me Everyday Cap and the Elements cap?
templates.content: The only difference is that there's no button on the top of the Elements Cap.

templates.name: Return Policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://alpakagear.com/pages/returns

templates.name: Free Shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $95. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Customer Support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us directly here https://alpakagear.com/pages/contactus Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: What device size can fit in the Elements Tech Brief 14"?
templates.content: The Elements Tech Brief 14" can only hold up to a size of a Macbook Pro 14". We don't recommend a tablet or laptop bigger than that.

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content: You can take a look at our full warranty policy here: https://alpakagear.com/pages/warranty

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://alpakagear.com/pages/store-locator

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?
templates.content: All our items are made in Shenzhen, China.

templates.name: Social Media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/alpakagear/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/alpakagear

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://alpakagear.com/pages/rewards

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at hello@alpakagear.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you!

templates.name: Shipping Time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and we usually ship via USPS, UPS and FedEx. Once shipped, it will take 7-10 business days.

templates.name: How do I apply to become a brand ambassador?
templates.content: Thanks for your interest! If you'd like to become one of our brand ambassadors, you can apply here: https://alpakagear.com/pages/brand-ambassadors If you have any questions, feel free to let me know.

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: We can make changes to your order only if it's not shipped out already. Simply email your order number, full name, and new address on this link: https://alpakagear.com/pages/contactus and our team would be glad to help you!
